backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing user profile CRUD and texture preset management (save, get, delete, list) with role-based access control via MixinAuthorization and AccessControl modules.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping four product features (texture generator, export panel, presets library, visual theme) to their implementing source files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON dictionary of one-line summaries for every frontend source file, serving as a quick reference for the purpose and key details of each component, hook, utility, and page.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH CSS custom properties for light and dark color themes including background, foreground, accent, chart, and sidebar tokens.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point that mounts the React app into a root div and loads the TypeScript module entry point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root app component implementing an auth state machine that routes between loading, login, profile setup, and the main TextureGenerator page based on identity and profile state.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Application shell providing a fixed header with logo, auth button, and user name display, a scrollable main content area, and a footer with attribution.
frontend/src/components/MaterialSelector: Grid UI component for selecting one of eight material categories (metal, wood, stone, fabric, plastic, organic, ceramic, concrete) with amber highlight on the active selection.
frontend/src/components/ParameterControl: React component that renders texture parameter controls including a color picker, pattern style selector, and slider rows for roughness, metalness, and other numeric parameters.
frontend/src/components/PresetsLibrary.t: React component that displays a scrollable list of saved texture presets with options to load or delete each, fetching data via React Query hooks.
frontend/src/components/SavePresetDialog: Modal dialog component that allows users to name and save the current texture configuration as a reusable preset via a mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/TextureExportPan: Panel component that generates and downloads individual or all PBR texture maps (albedo, normal, roughness, metalness) as PNG files based on current texture parameters.
frontend/src/components/TexturePreview3D: 3D preview component using React Three Fiber that renders a rotating sphere with procedurally generated PBR texture maps applied as canvas textures.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an Internet Computer actor instance using the current identity, reinitializing and invalidating dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication on ICP, managing login/logout state, identity persistence, and AuthClient creation with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles and texture presets via the backend actor, including get, save, and delete operations.
Defines texture parameter types, default configs per material type (including extended UI-only types), and a hook for managing and updating texture generation parameters.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that imports fonts, configures Tailwind, and defines a dark industrial OKLCH-based design token system with custom utility classes for amber accents and panel styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Login page component displaying the TextureCraft branding, feature list, and an Internet Identity login button with loading state handling.
frontend/src/pages/ProfileSetupPage.tsx: One-time profile setup page that prompts the user to enter their name and saves it on-chain via the saveCallerUserProfile mutation before proceeding to the main app.
frontend/src/pages/TextureGenerator.tsx: Main page component for the texture generator tool, featuring a collapsible left panel for material selection and parameter controls, a central 3D viewport with a randomize/save toolbar, and a collapsible right panel for export and presets.
frontend/src/utils/downloadHelper.ts: Provides two utility functions: one to trigger a PNG download from an HTMLCanvasElement, and one to build a sanitized filename string from material type and map type.
frontend/src/utils/textureMapGenerator.t: Implements procedural texture map generation using Perlin noise and fBm algorithms, with canvas-based rendering for albedo, normal, roughness, and metalness maps based on configurable parameters.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility module for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routes, with sessionStorage fallback for cross-navigation persistence.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining a dark industrial theme with custom OKLCH color tokens (amber accents, panel/viewport shades), custom fonts, border radii, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state manifest tracking schema version, feature status, architectural notes, and pending feature requests for a 3D texture generator tool with PBR material support, export, presets, and a dark industrial UI theme.
